view

Class BoardScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • view.BoardScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class BoardScene
extends javafx.scene.Scene
implements java.util.Observer
    This class creates the entire board and is controlled by the controller for the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BoardScene.GameTimer
      This class manages all things related to the timer used for the placement phase.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardScene

        public BoardScene(boolean team,
                  boolean server,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Main constructor.
        Parameters:
        team - False for red team, true for blue team.
        server - True if player is server, false if player is client.
        host - Host name.
        port - Port number.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If IO error.

    • Method Detail

      • initCells

        private void initCells()
        Initialize the board cells with either grass or water and allow action events.

      • moveSelected

        private boolean moveSelected(Loc to)
        Moves selected piece to a chosen location.
        Parameters:
        to - The chosen location to the move the selected piece to.
        Returns:
        True if selected a cell with a piece and valid destination location.

        public void selectPiece(Loc loc,
                        BoardCell cell)
        Selects the piece at the specified location and cell.
        Parameters:
        loc - Specified location.
        cell - Specified cell.

      • setOurTurn

        private void setOurTurn(boolean ourTurn)
        Sets our turn and disables our pane if true.
        Parameters:
        ourTurn - True if this turn is our turn.

      • invertLocation

        private Loc invertLocation(Loc loc)
        Flip a location to the opposite side of the board. This is used to convert locations so that Player 2 has a flipped view of the board.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location on the board
        Returns:
        Inverted location

      • getCell

        private BoardCell getCell(Loc loc)
        Get a cell given a location. This method takes into account if the view is inverted.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location in the model.
        Returns:
        Corresponding board cell.

      • getLocation

        private Loc getLocation(BoardCell cell)
        Get the location in the model that corresponds to the given board cell. This method accounts for the view being inverted.
        Parameters:
        cell - BoardCell on the grid.
        Returns:
        Corresponding model location.

      • onGameOver

        private void onGameOver(boolean winnerTeam)
        Performs game over animation when game over.
        Parameters:
        winnerTeam - False if red team wins, true if blue team wins.

      • onClosed

        public void onClosed()
        Closes all sockets.

                   java.lang.Object arg)

        Parameters:
        o - Model instance
        arg - Piece information

      • startPlacementPhase

        private void startPlacementPhase()
        Starts placement phase after two players connected over network.
